description: Liquity is a decentralized borrowing protocol that allows you to borrow LUSD (a USD pegged stablecoin) interest free using Ether as collateral. The loans are secured by a Stability Pool containing LUSD and by borrowers collectively acting as guarantors of last resort.

en.description: Liquity is a decentralized borrowing protocol that allows you to borrow LUSD (a USD pegged stablecoin) interest free using Ether as collateral. The loans are secured by a Stability Pool containing LUSD and by borrowers collectively acting as guarantors of last resort.

fr.description: Liquity is a decentralized borrowing protocol that allows you to borrow LUSD (a USD pegged stablecoin) interest free using Ether as collateral. The loans are secured by a Stability Pool containing LUSD and by borrowers collectively acting as guarantors of last resort.

es.description: Liquity es un protocolo de préstamo descentralizado que le permite pedir prestado LUSD (una moneda estable vinculada al USD) sin intereses utilizando Ether como garantía. Los préstamos están garantizados por un grupo de estabilidad que contiene LUSD y por prestatarios que actúan colectivamente como garantes de último recurso.

zh.description: Liquity 是去中心化借贷平台，用户抵押 ETH 可以 0 利息借出 LUSD（美元稳定币）。LUSD 稳定池和作为最后担保人的借款人为债务做共同担保。
